code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Button}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginButton=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLoginClick=()=>{navigate('/login');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",fullWidth:true,style:{marginTop:'1em'},className:"animate__animated animate__pulse",onMouseEnter:e=>e.currentTarget.classList.add('animate__infinite'),onMouseLeave:e=>e.currentTarget.classList.remove('animate__infinite'),onClick:handleLoginClick,children:"Login"});};export default LoginButton;
